name: Spaze
description:
Billy was sitting on his parents' porch on a late July night, surrounded by fields and cattle, when a beam of light swung through the air first lifting a pig, dropping it, lifting a cow, dropping it and then lifting him.... and abducting him?
After waking up Billy finds himself dressed in a strange suit in front of a strange alien creature called Snuzz which for unknown reasons wants to test his intelligence.

Following suit of its inspiration, this 2D puzzle game puts you into the body of a poor American, forced to complete test after test. Puzzle yourself through each level and combine power-ups, time-based-mechanics and that certain sarcastic humor to find the end of this experiment and show Snuzz that you're smarter than an Alabama-boy abducting alien-race.
